articles.title: Byju’s FY22 losses soar to Rs 8,245 crore; cash-strapped edtech explores rights issue at $500 million valu - The Economic Times
articles.description: The rights issue, where existing investors will be offered the option to buy new shares in Think & Learn, may value the edtech firm at anywhere between $500 million to $1 billion.
